Blackstorm:

"Why all treat me as baby?"complainted Blacstork "I'm grow up enough 
to take care my self... I don't need babies-sitters... why can 
anyone understand that???"



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> Maxima stood there with the look of shock & annoyance on her face 
as well as 
> confussion. Someone, one of these Predacons, changed themself to 
look like 
> Hydras. If a Decepticon did this without Megatron's planning or 
permission, 
> they would be immediately terminated. 
> 
> Before she could react to his statement, Blackstorm emerged.. 
spoke & started 
> to leave. But was caught by this new form of what was Aerotaur. 
> 
> "Blackstorm is little of your concern. She is under my protection, 
by 
> Perceptor here, until Hydras has been repaired." 
> 
> "Oh, and a fair warning," she continued, speaking to Hevn. Her 
claw hands on 
> her hips as she stood tall, "I doubt Hydras would be amused with 
the 
> similarity between you & him." 
> 
> She thought about speaking in response to his other question 
before he 
> focused his attention upon Blackstorm. It wasn't Hydras that she 
had a 
> weakness for, but it was the part of Megatron that she had a 
serious weakness 
> for. The part of Megatron... that soon became Galvatron. 
> 
> This part.... she would keep from the others, her feelings towards 
Hydras. 
> After millions of years of holding them in check... they were 
finally 
> released. But only to Hydras.
